entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The text does not explicitly mention Harry Potter, but it is implied that he has defeated You-Know-Who. The old man's behavior and the atmosphere of celebration suggest that Harry Potter is a significant figure in this story.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned as having been defeated by Harry Potter. The text describes him as a powerful and feared entity.

relationships.description: The old man's statement 'You-Know-Who has gone at last!' implies that Harry Potter has defeated You-Know-Who.
